name: AngularApp
tagline: Skeleton for AngularJS Application with build automation configured
body:
# AngularApp
Skeleton for AngularJS Application with build automation configured

This Application is configured with minimum plugin that is required for development, build scripts are written for making a production build.

Note : Currently it is in development process. Not all functionality works.

## Tools Configured in the Application
* Grunt and Gulp - for Build Automation (either of Grunt/Gulp can be used. Both are provided as an option for use.)
* Jasmine - for writing unit test cases for controllers and services
* Karma - for Test runner
* Angular Material - for UI Designing
* Less and Sass - for CSS pre-processing (Both are provided as an option to choose.)

For more Details read below...

## Initializing the Application
Run npm install from the root AngularApp folder.

This will automatically run bower install for you.

You can start the application by running http-server on client folder within AngularApp.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
